name: Steel Diver™: Sub Wars
description:
As of late March 2023, it will no longer be possible to make purchases in Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS, including add-on content for this game. For more information please visit Support.

Battle your friends and the world in high-tension submarine combat! Command your submarine and crew either locally or over the internet in four on four team battles. Hone your skills to perfect the art of warfare and rule the seas!

An ocean of challenges await the nautically gifted in single player skirmishes. Call in an air strike with Morse code or take on a massive fleet… all on your own! As you rise in rank and status, assemble your submarine’s crew strategically, as each shipmate carries unique strengths and weaknesses. Then, give your enemies something to remember you by with customizable patterns and colors for your ship. With all this, there’s a boatload to master!

Available in the free-to-play version: two default submarines, two single-player missions, limited crew members, and limited submarine patterns. Full premium version is available for purchase in-game.
disclaimer:
In-game content available for purchase using stored account funds.

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

Wireless broadband Internet access required for online feartures. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com. Additional games and systems required for multiplayer mode; sold separately.
